description: Retrieves details about the resource shares that you own or that are shared with you.

parameters.name: resourceShareArns
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of individual resource shares that you want information about. (string) ---

parameters.name: resourceOwner
parameters.description: Specifies that you want to retrieve details of only those resource shares that match the following: SELF --- resource shares that your account shares with other accounts OTHER-ACCOUNTS --- resource shares that other accounts share with your account.

parameters.name: tagFilters
parameters.description: Specifies that you want to retrieve details of only those resource shares that match the specified tag keys and values. (dict) --- A tag key and optional list of possible values that you can use to filter results for tagged resources. tagKey (string) --- The tag key. This must have a valid string value and can't be empty. tagValues (list) --- A list of zero or more tag values. If no values are provided, then the filter matches any tag with the specified key, regardless of its value. (string) ---

nested_params.name: tagKey
nested_params.description: The tag key. This must have a valid string value and can't be empty.

nested_params.name: tagValues
nested_params.description: A list of zero or more tag values. If no values are provided, then the filter matches any tag with the specified key, regardless of its value.

nested_items.name: resourceShares
nested_items.description: An array of objects that contain the information about the resource shares.

nested_items.name: resourceShareArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource share.

nested_items.name: owningAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource share.

nested_items.name: allowExternalPrincipals
nested_items.description: Indicates whether principals outside your organization in Organizations can be associated with a resource share.
True --- the resource share can be shared with any Amazon Web Services account.
False --- the resource share can be shared with only accounts in the same organization as the account that owns the resource share.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the resource share.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the resource share.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag key and value pairs attached to the resource share.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, attached to the tag. Every tag must have a key. Key names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The string value attached to the tag. The value can be an empty string. Key values are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the resource share was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the resource share was last updated.

nested_items.name: featureSet
nested_items.description: Indicates what features are available for this resource share. This parameter can have one of the following values:

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
